Story.Text: Welcome to the story... Would you like to proceed?
Okay, you can leave.
It's a spooky afternoon in New York. You are walking down the street and you see someone who is begging for money. They might be homeless.

Options.Text: I'm going to give them some change.

Story.Text: The homeless man appreciates the money and thanks you.
You walk past the homeless man with no issue. They are probably used to it.
Your phone is ringing... It's from an unknown caller. Are you going to answer?

They don't say anything for a few seconds... You say "hello?" with no response.*However, right before you tried to hang up an old sounding voice starts talking.*"I don't understand who you think you are, but never call this number again!"*You respond by saying "You called me!?".*"Oh, okay." says the old sounding person on the phone.*They hang up, with no time for you to give a response.

Options.Text: Okay, that was weird... Maybe they had the wrong number?

Story.Text: You hung up. "If it really matters they will call me again." you say in your mind.
Today has been interesting, how about you head home?
You are now heading home. People have been wondering what happened to you.
Stop.
STOP!

Options.Text: What did I even do? ðŸ˜­

Story.Text: LOL! ðŸ¤£ðŸ˜Š*I'm just messing with you! You should really get home now.

Options.Text: Oh, okay.... Don't do that again, please.

Story.Text: You're actually heading home now. However, you hear a strange noise coming from behind you.*What are going to do?

Options.Text: Look back and see what it is.

Story.Text: You look back to see its the old person that called you before...*They are holding a knife... You try to run but there is no hope.*They catch up to you easily... You are stabbed 24 times according to the police record.*Unfortunately, they leave no trace and get away free.**Your death is all over the news, short amount of fame but at least you got your own wikipedia article now.*However, I doubt you want this to be your ending. How about you try again?
You hear the voice getting closer, so you start to run.*"RUN! ... RUN! .. RUN WHILE YOU STILL CAN!" the old sounding voice screams.**You run in fear, you're scared, and you have no idea where to go.
You see a unfamiliar coffee shop, you are not sure if you should run in to hide.*What will you do?
You go inside to hide. Only to find it was a trap.*People inside were waiting for you...**You get murdered, how unfortunate.
You keep running... And running... And running...**You finally escape, and you are now out of all places, actually home.

Once you finally close the door, it's over.**You wake up in exhaustion. It was all just a terrible dream.*You have no idea why you would have that dream. The old person chasing you is just a fuzzy memory, you don't even know if they were a man. You feel as if something is over, however nothing started. It was all just a dream after all. A very terrible dream however. One that can only remind you of your deepest sorrows. Things like this seem to happen to you a lot... Why does that happen? I know you would like to know, however I don't have an answer for you. Please, don't fall asleep, because it will just happen again... Sleeping is a lot of fun, and I know you like it a lot. But the more you dream, the more you remember.**Thanks for reading,*Jacob Humston
